job.title: Software Engineer - Omni-Channel Engagement
job.industry: Computer Software,Human Resources,Information Technology and Services
job.description: brstrongDo what you love Love what you do brbrstrong At Workday we help the worlds largest organizations adapt to whats next by bringing finance HR and planning into a single enterprise cloud We work hard and were serious about what we do But we like to have fun too We put people first celebrate diversity drive innovation and do good in the communities where we live and work brbrstrongAbout the TeambrstrongWe are responsible for delivering tens of billions of messages annually via multiple channels Email SMS Mobile Push  Our team is building the next generation Communication platform to deliver the right message to the right person at the right time to the channels that can get the most engagement valuebrstrongAbout the RolebrbrstrongDo you want to get into the details as needed to work directly with developers writing code andor to spike concepts and ideas Do you believe that mentoring is an important contribution to the longterm success of the teambrbrYou will distill and adapt complex nuanced technical  architectural concepts for audiences ranging from new college hires to senior management and think about the operational and security side of the software and dont simply believe that software in production is someone elses problembrulliCraft and build REST APIs highly scalable collaboration platform and featuresliliCollaborate in a small team using your engineering background to get work done liliExert your independence and ability to learn unfamiliar technologyliliBuild and maintain robust and quality code and reliable automated testsbrbrliulstrongAbout YoubrbrstrongstrongWhat we are looking forbrstrongulliBachelors Degree or higher preferably Computer ScienceEngineering majorliliYou have experience owning production systemsliliExperience developing cloud software services and an understanding of design for scalability performance and reliability and tradeoffs thereinliliExtensive experience developing distributed and concurrent systems secure fault tolerant highly available recoverable consistent scalable and predictable and the tradeoffs thereinbrliulstrongstrongQualificationsstrongstrongulli2 Years of development in object oriented design JavaliliPrevious experience developing in an AgileScrum environmentliliA love for learning and a passion for helping others liliReact and NodeJS experience a plusbrbrliul Workday is an Equal Opportunity Employer including individuals with disabilities and protected veterans
